command.text: select "isa"."isaID" "IsaID" ,"isa"."CompanyCode" "CompanyCode" ,"isa"."isaSiteID" "IsaSiteID" ,"isaSite"."SiteName" "IsaSiteName" ,"isaSiteisaPropertyMgmt"."PropertyMgntName" "IsaSiteisaPropertyMgmtPropertyMgntName" ,"isa"."reqestedDate" "ReqestedDate" ,"isa"."DueDate" "DueDate" ,"isa"."CompellingEvent" "CompellingEvent" ,"isa"."isaCompetitorID" "IsaCompetitorID" ,"isaCompetitor"."CompetitorName" "IsaCompetitorName" ,"isa"."ContractTerm" "ContractTerm" ,"isa"."SalesPerson" "SalesPerson" from "dbo"."isa" "isa" left join "dbo"."isaSite" "isaSite" on "isa"."isaSiteID" = "isaSite"."isaSiteID" left join "dbo"."isaPropertyMgmt" "isaSiteisaPropertyMgmt" on "isaSite"."isaPropertyMgmtID" = "isaSiteisaPropertyMgmt"."isaPropertyMgmtID" left join "dbo"."isaCompetitorMaster" "isaCompetitor" on "isa"."isaCompetitorID" = "isaCompetitor"."isaCompetitorMasterID"
